code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const travelLogApi={getAll:async function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;const response=await api.get("/travel-log?page=".concat(page,"&limit=").concat(limit));return response.data;},create:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/travel-log',data);return response.data;},like:async id=>{const response=await api.post("/travel-log/".concat(id,"/like"));return response.data;}};export const friendsApi={getAll:async search=>{const response=await api.get('/friends',{params:{search}});return response.data;},create:async data=>{const response=await api.post('/friends',data);return response.data;},update:async(id,data)=>{const response=await api.patch("/friends/".concat(id),data);return response.data;},delete:async id=>{await api.delete("/friends/".concat(id));}};export default api;
